DocAttribute.Name: Extent
DocAttribute.Documentation: The extent in the x and y direction of the text literal.

DocAttribute.Name: BoxAlignment
DocAttribute.Documentation: The alignment of the text literal relative to its position.

DocWhereRule.Name: WR31
DocWhereRule.Documentation: The subtype of _IfcPlanarExtent_, _IfcPlanarBox_, should not be used to represent an _Extent_ for the text literal.
